original_text: People everywhere have seen the things that God has done. But we look at them from far away. People everywhere have seen the things that God has done. But we look at them from far away. People everywhere have seen the things that God has done.
korean_text: 그의 일을 모든 사람이 우러러보나니 먼 데서도 보느니라

sentences.original_text: People everywhere have seen the things that God has done.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람들이 하나님이 하신 일들을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: But we look at them from far away.
People everywhere have seen the things that God has done.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람들이 하나님이 하신 일들을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: But we look at them from far away.
People everywhere have seen the things that God has done.
